item.title: Uncertainty in Deep Learning
item.description: Topic: uncertainty in deep learning References: Gawlikowski, J. et al. A Survey of Uncertainty in Deep Neural Networks. Arxiv (2021). Jospin, L. V., Buntine, W., Boussaid, F., Laga, H. & Bennamoun, M. Hands-on Bayesian Neural Networks – a Tutorial for Deep Learning Users. Arxiv (2020). Gal, Yarin. “Uncertainty in deep learning.” (2016): 3.
